text: فلو ان لنا كرة فنكون من المؤمنين

translations.translation: If only we could have another chance then we would be among the mumin
If only we could return and be among the believers!"
If only we could return we would be among the believers."
Would that we could have a chance to live again so that we might become believers."
“So if only were we to go back, in order to become Muslims!”
(Alas!) If we only had a chance to return, we shall truly be among the believers!"
But if we could but once return, we would be of the believers.
O that we might return again, and be among the believers!'
Oh, that we had another turn (on earth), that we might be of the believers!
If we could only return to the world and be among the believers."
Were there for us a return, we would be of the believers.
Had there been another turn for us, we would be among the faithful.’
Now if we only had a chance of return we shall truly be of those who believe!'"
(Alas!) If we only had a chance to return (to the world), we shall truly be among the believers!
Would that we might return again, and be among the believers'
If only we could have another chance, we would be among the faithful.”
Then if we only had a return [to the world] and could be of the believers... "

[26:102] If only we had another turn, [another] return to this world, we would have been among those who believe!’ (law, ‘if only’, here is for [the conditional] optative, to which nakūna, ‘we would have been’, constitutes the response).
(Oh, that we had another turn) in the life of the world, (that we might be of the believers!

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: وبعدما قنطوا عن الشفاعة والحماية تمنوا الرجعة والإعادة، وقالوا: { فَلَوْ أَنَّ لَنَا كَرَّةً } رجعة وعودة إلى الدنيا مرة بعد مرة أخرى { فَنَكُونَ مِنَ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ } [الشعراء: 102] بالله، الموحدين له لا نشرك به شيئاً من مظاهره ومصنوعاته
